ui::ButtonPin Class Reference

Documentation

This class implements a button using a hal::Pin object.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ui::ButtonPin::ButtonPin ( int  port,
int  pin,
bool  active_value = true 
)

Construct a new ButtonPin

The pin must be initialized using Pin::init()

Parameters
portThe port associated with the pin
pinThe pin number on the port for the button input
active_valuetrue for active high and false for active low

Member Function Documentation

bool ui::ButtonPin::active_value ( ) const
inline

This method accesses the active value.

Returns
True for active high and false for active low.
